description.message: üöÄ Instantly reopen closed tabs with one click‚Äîno shortcuts needed!

title.message:
Recover Closed Tab

Left-click to restore
Right-click to view history

title_no_context_menu.message:
Recover Closed Tab

Left-click to restore

select_icon_tooltip.message: Select your preferred image; after saving, it will replace the current extension icon.

restore_icon_tooltip.message: Click this button to restore the extension icon to its default state.

restore_method_tooltip.message: Choose a method to restore closed tabs. 'Use browser's built-in function' is equivalent to pressing Ctrl+Shift+T; 'Use extension's recorded history' relies on the extension's own records.

restoreWithSessions.message: Use browser's built-in function to restore (equivalent to shortcut Ctrl+Shift+T)

restore_with_sessions_tooltip.message: Uses the browser's built-in session restore function, equivalent to pressing Ctrl+Shift+T. Can restore tabs and windows, and supports back and forward navigation.

restoreWithOldMethod.message: Use browsing history recorded by the extension to restore

restore_with_old_method_tooltip.message: The extension records and restores closed tabs on its own. Some long-time users may prefer this method.

restoreToEndLabel.message: Restore tabs to the far right

restore_to_end_tooltip.message: When 'Use browser's built-in function' is selected, tabs are restored to their original positions. Enabling this option will move restored tabs to the far right, making them easier to manage and click.

save_tooltip.message: Click this button to save all your settings changes.

clear_history_tooltip.message: Clear the extension's recorded history of closed tabs; this will not affect the history when using the browser's built-in restore function.

reset_tooltip.message: Reset all settings to their default states. All custom changes will be lost. Please confirm before proceeding.

advertising_word.message: üåü Ad: My company specializes in producing high-quality drawstring bags and exquisite bows for textile packaging. If you have ordering needs, feel free to learn more!

advertising_link.message: Click here to visit my company's official website

advertising_link_2.message: The accelerator I'm using, 5% off discount code: HEROESNEVERDIE

click_to_open_file.message: Due to security restrictions, the extension cannot directly open local files. Please right-click the following link to open in a new tab:

security_warning.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Opening local files can pose security risks.

confirm_file_safe.message: Please ensure the local file is safe before clicking.

tab_not_saved_message.message: Note: When you close this page, it will not be saved to the list of closed tabs.

maxClosedTabsLabel.message: Maximum number of closed tabs to store:

max_closed_tabs_tooltip.message: Set the maximum number of closed tabs the extension records; older records beyond this number will be automatically deleted. Setting to 0 means closed tabs won't be recorded (this recovery method will not work).

clearHistoryOnInitLabel.message: Clear extension history on each browser startup

clearHistoryOnInit_tooltip.message: When enabled, the extension's recorded history of closed tabs will be cleared each time the browser starts (only effective for 'Use extension's recorded history' recovery method).

enable_context_menu_label.message: Enable context menu to show recently closed tabs

enable_context_menu_tooltip.message: When enabled, you can right-click the extension icon to view and restore recently closed tabs directly from the menu.

maxListItemsLabel.message: Number of items to display in the recently closed tabs list:

max_list_items_tooltip.message: Set the number of recently closed tabs displayed in the context menu, ranging from 1 to 1000 (maximum 25 when using the browser's built-in restore function due to browser limitations).

historyClearedMessage.message: Extension's recorded history has been cleared

useOldMethodInIncognitoLabel.message: Switch to 'Use extension's recorded history' in Incognito mode

useOldMethodInIncognito_tooltip.message: When enabled, clicking the extension in Incognito mode will automatically use the extension's recorded history to restore (since the browser's built-in restore function is unavailable in Incognito mode).
